subject: Rugby (Game)
lead_paragraph: Robbie Deans, the coach of Australia, has been under fire, even though his team has suffered a rash of injuries. But it took a victory over Argentina on Saturday to ensure that he will be around for awhile.
snippet: Robbie Deans, the coach of Australia, has been under fire, even though his team has suffered a rash of injuries. But it took a victory over Argentina on Saturday to ensure that he will be around for awhile.
